Description.Text:
Position Located in a suitable zone for those who travel for business or for pleasure, Art Hotel Udine has a strategic position: at a short distance from Udine - Sud Highway Exit and very close to the City Centre.
Restaurant The breakfast is served in the breakfast room from 7 a.m. to 10 a.m.
More Informations Modern settings, refined design, in high quality sorroundings: with the new opening, Art Hotel Udine offers elegance and functionality of spaces; its furniture is designed and conceived for the complete satisfaction of those who, in town for business, tourism or study, ask for accurate and efficient services, adequate comfort in an absolute prestigious environment. Each element inside the hotel, from furniture to signposting, is a little piece of art and design. To complete the offer, guests will find a cosy relaxing-zone with lounge bar and reading-corner, a meeting room capable of 60 people and private parking.
